actions.description: The psurlon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description: The psurlon targets one creature it can see within 120 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw, taking 14 (2d10 + 3) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
actions.name: Psychic Crush

actions.description:
The psurlon casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
1/day each: suggestion

2/day each: disguise self, mage armor (self only)
actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)

specialTraits.description: Magic can't read the psurlon's thoughts or put the psurlon to sleep.
specialTraits.name: Aberrant Mind
